name: Margarita
description: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

name: Blue Margarita
description: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Tommy's Margarita
description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Whitecap Margarita
description: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

name: Strawberry Margarita
description: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Smashed Watermelon Margarita
description: In a mason jar muddle the watermelon and 5 mint leaves together into a puree and strain. Next add the grapefruit juice, juice of half a lime and the tequila as well as some ice. Put a lid on the jar and shake. Pour into a glass and add more ice. Garnish with fresh mint and a small slice of watermelon.

name: ABC
description: Layered in a shot glass.

name: B-53
description: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

name: B-52
description: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

name: Derby
description: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

name: Bijou
description: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain

name: Boxcar
description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Zombie
description:
Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.

Pour into a glass, add ice cubes to fill, then add the garnish.

*Donn’s mix: Bring 3 crushed cinnamon sticks, 1 cup of sugar and 1 cup of water to a boil, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.

Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from the heat and let sit for at least 2 hours before straining into a clean glass bottle.

Then add 1 part of the syrup and 2 parts of fresh grapefruit juice together.

name: Abilene
description: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Big Red
description: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

name: Zambeer
description: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

name: Bellini
description: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

name: Bramble
description: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

name: Balmoral
description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bluebird
description: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

name: Snowball
description: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Danbooka
description: pour it in and mix it.

name: 501 Blue
description: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

name: Brooklyn
description: Combine ingredients with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Boomerang
description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Queen Bee
description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bora Bora
description: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

name: Lunch Box
description: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

name: Barracuda
description: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

name: Jitterbug
description: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

name: Adam Bomb
description: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruit juice depending on personal preference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.
